APR FC vs Police FC

APR FC 2-0 Police FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Ngabo Roben

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:26

Umukino urarangiye

Umusifuzi ahushye mu ifirimbi yemeza ko umukino urangiye APR FC itsinze Police FC 2-0, ikomeza kuyobora urutonde rwa shampiyona y'u Rwanda n'amanota 35, irusha Rayon Sports iyikurikiye amanota ane

17:23

88' Police FC iteye mu izamu yaraririye umusifuzi igitego aracyanga

Ngendahimana Eric atunguye Kimenyi Yves amutera ishoti, umupira ugera ku kirenge cya Antoine Dominique Ndayishimiye wari waraririye umupira ujya mu rushundura ariko umusifuzi amutera imboni igitego aracyanga

17:21

86' Buregeya Prince atabaye APR FC

Iyabivuze Osee azamukanye umupira awucomekera Arafat Bahame uri gukina na APR FC yahozemo, ariko myugariro Buregeya Prince ahagarara neza arenza umupira

17:13

79' IGITEGO CYA KABIRI CYA APR FC

Rutahizamu Sugira Ernest atsindiye APR FC igitego cya kabiri. Ni umupira uhinduwe na Ombolenga Fitina ku ruhande rw'iburyo usanga uyu rutahizamu utari witwaye neza mu mukino ateye mu izamu Nduwayo Danny awukuramo uramugarukira awusubiza mu izamu

17:10

75' Ntibisanzwe, Uwimbabazi Jean Paul yagiye mu kibuga asimbuye none ahise asimburwa

Nyuma yo gusimbura Peter Otema 24, Uwimbabazi Jean Paul asimbuwe na Kevin Hakizimana. Umutoza Albert Mphande ntabwo yishimiye uburyo nta mbaraga yongereye mu busatirizi

17:07

73' Sugira Ernest ntabwo ari mu bihe byiza

Savio Nshuti ahaye umupira Sugira Ernest ari imbere y'izamu wenyine ananirwa gutera mu izamu

17:02

69' Gusimbuza ku ruhande rwa APR FC

Umutoza Jimmy Mulisa akuyemo abakinnyi babiri. Issa Bigirimana asimbuye Byiringiro Lague naho Imran Nshimiyimana asimburwa na Nizeyimana Mirafa

16:58

65' Coup franc ya APR FC

Savio Nshuti azamukanye umupira ku ruhande rw'ibumoso acenga Ngendahimana Eric Gasongo amukorera ikosa haboneka coup franc itewe na Muhadjiri Hakizimana ariko Nduwayo Danny urindira Police FC ahagarara neza afata umupira

16:57

63' Umutoza Jimmy Mulisa ntabwo yishimiye imyitwarire y'abakinnyi be

Abakinnyi ba Police FC bakomeje guhererekanya neza, yagera imbere y'izamu ntishobore gufungura amazamu ya Kimenyi Yves. Ntabwo Jimmy Mulisa yishimiye uburyo abakinnyi be bari gukina bugarira

16:42

48' Sugira Ernest ntabwo yishimiwe na bagenzi be

Rutahizamu Sugira Ernest ahawe umupira na Ombolenga Fitina yirukanka agana izamu ariko ananirwa guhindura umupira ku ruhande Muhadjiri na Savio Nshuti bari bahagazeho bonyine agerageza kwiterera mu izamu umupira uca hejuru. Bagenzi be bamusabye kureka kwiharira

16:37

Abasifuzi bagarutse bahinduye imyenda

Abayoboye umukino basifuye igice cya mbere bambaye imyenda y'umukara n'umuhondo ariko kubera kunyagirwa bagarutse bahinduye ubu bambaye imyenda itukura

16:36

Igice cya kabiri cy'umukino kiratangiye

Police FC itangije igice cya kabiri, Isaie Songa na Dominique Ndayishimiye batangiye basatira

16:21

Igice cya mbere cy'umukino kirangiye APR FC iyoboye

Iminota 45 irangiye APR FC ifite igitego 1-0 ariko nyuma Police FC yitwaye neza ariko ibura amahirwe yo kwishyura

16:18

Iminota ibiri y'inyongera ku gice cya mbere

Mu gihe umusifuzi yongejeho iminota ibiri, Police FC ihushije uburyo bwabazwe kuri coup franc itewe na Antoine Dominique Ndayishimiye ikora ku mutwe wa Imran Nshimiyimana ujya muri Koruneri, nayo ikuwemo neza na ba myugariro ba APR FC

16:14

42' Kimenyi Yves agiye kuvurwa

Nyuma yo guhushwa ibitego byinshi na Police FC, umunyezamu wa APR FC abwiye umusifuzi ko ari kubabara mu kagombambari none umukino ubaye uhagaze uyu munyezamu ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

16:13

40' Police FC yariye amavubi

Ikipe ya Police FC ikomeje gusatira ishaka igitego cyo kwishyura. Contre-attaque ikozwe na Isaie Songa na Jean Paul Uwimbabazi bahererekanya neza ariko Michel Rusheshangoga abarushije umuvuduko abakuraho umupira arawurenza. Koruneri ya Police FC ntacyo ibyaye

16:10

37' Muhadjiri Hakizimana yihanangirijwe n'umusifuzi

Rutahizamu watsinze igitego atakaje umupira awamburwa na kapiteni wa Police FC Eric Ngendahimana ahita amukorera ikosa none umusifuzi Murindangabo MoÃ¯se aramwihanangirije amubwira ko niyongera gukora ikosa amuhanisha ikarita y'umuhondo

16:05

31' Amazi ari imbere y'izamu atabaye APR FC

Ndayishimiye Antoine Dominique ahawe umupira uvuye muri Koruneri agerageje gutera mu izamu ukurwamo na myugariro Emmanuel Imanishimwe usongwa na Songa ashaka kwishyurira Police FC ariko umupira widunda mu mazi imbere y'izamu ugabanya umuvuduko, Ombolenga Fitina ahita akiza izamu

16:03

Kuba ikibuga cyuzuye amazi bishobora kubyarira abakinnyi imvune

Ikibuga gitose n'ikirere gikonje biri gutuma abakinnyi badakoresha umubiri ngo birukanke banatere intambwe ndende uko bisanzwe. Abagerageje gushyiramo imbaraga nyinshi bari kugira ibibazo. Nyuma ya Peter Otema, na Sugira Ernest ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga

15:59

24' Gusimbuza kwa mbere ku ruhande rwa Police FC

Peter Otema ugize ikibazo ku rutugu asimbujwe Uwimbabazi Jean Paul Police FC yaguze avuye muri Kirehe FC mu mpeshyi ya 2018

15:58

22' Umukino ubaye uhagaze

Rutahizamu Peter Otema wa Police FC agonganye na Michel Rusheshangoga none ahamagariwe 'brancard'. Agiye kwitabwaho n'abaganga mu mbangukiragutabara

15:53

20' Nubwo imvura ari nyinshi ariko umukino uraryoshye

Ikipe ya Police FC ikomeje guhererekanya neza ishaka uko yabona igitego cyo kwishyura ariko umunyezamu Kimenyi Yves abereye ibamba rutahizamu Songa Isaie wari umutunguje ishoti ari hanze y'urubuga rw'amahina

15:50

16' Police FC itabawe n'umutambiko

Umupira uzamukanywe na Ombolenga Fitina azamukanye umupira awuha Muhadjiri Hakizimana atazuyaje atera ishoti rikomeye ariko umupira ugarurwa n'umutambiko w'izamu. APR FC ihushije uburyo bwari kuyiha igitego cya kabiri

15:43

Muhadjiri Hakizimana yari amaze iminsi avugwaho byinshi

15:38

01' APR FC itangiye ifungura amazamu

Umukino utangijwe na APR FC habaho guhererekanya kwihuse kwa Savio Nshuti na Byiringiro Lague wakorewe ikosa rikosorwa na Muhadjiri Hakizimana ahita afungura amazamu arinzwe na Nduwayo Danny. Ni kimwe ku busa kugeza ubu.

15:37

Umusifuzi atangije umukino

Nyuma y'aho abantu bari bakangaranyijwe n'imvura yagwaga ku kibuga, umusifuzi Murindangabo MoÃ¯se yemeje ko idakanganye ku buryo yabuza umukino gutangira.

Abakinnyi 11 babanje mu kibuga ku mpande zombi.

Abakinnyi bagiye kwishyushya

15:02

Ubwo amakipe yageraga ku kibuga

15:01

Imvura ishobora gukerereza isaha y'umukino

Mu bice byinshi by'umujyi wa Kigali hari kugwa imvura nyinshi. Abakinnyi b'amakipe yombi bageze muri stade itaragwa ariko ntabwo baratangira kwishyushya kubera ko itangiye kugwa ari nyinshi

14:58

Amakipe yombi baserutse mu modoka z'inzego zibarizwamo

14:56

Ikipe z'abashinzwe umutekano zigiye guhangana mu mukino usoza ibanza ya shampiyona



APR FC igiye kwakira Police FC mu mukino usoza ibanza ya Shampiyona y'u Rwanda. IGIHE yageze kuri Stade ya Kigali ahagiye kubera uyu mukino tubahaye ikaze. Ni mu gihe kandi akavura ari kose mu bice bitandukanye bya Kigali, twizera ko katari buze kubangamira uyu mukino.
